commands.name: Discover .NET Solution
commands.description: Perform a full generic discovery of a legacy .NET 4.x solution.
commands.prompt: Use analysis/context/instructions/GENERIC_DOTNET_DISCOVERY_GUIDE.md and analysis/context/prompts/GENERIC_DISCOVERY_PROMPT.md. Discover ALL architecture components in the .NET solution including controllers, WCF/ASMX endpoints, DAL layers, EF6, ADO.NET, Unity DI, namespaces, configs, integrations, stored procedure usage, and dependency graphs. Write results ONLY to analysis/output/01_discovery.md. Do not output inline.

commands.name: Extract All APIs
commands.description: Extract every REST/SOAP/WCF/ASMX/API surface from the .NET app.
commands.prompt: Using GENERIC_API_EXTRACTION_GUIDE.md, extract ALL API endpoints from MVC, Web API, WCF, ASMX, handlers, and any custom routing. Include routes, verbs, DTOs, returns, exceptions. Write the full service catalog to analysis/output/02_service_catalog.md. No inline output.

commands.name: Extract All DAL
commands.description: Extract all ADO.NET, EF6, stored procedures, queries, LINQ, DataSets and custom DAL logic.
commands.prompt: Use GENERIC_DAL_DISCOVERY_GUIDE.md and GENERIC_DAL_MODERNIZATION_GUIDE.md to extract ALL DAL patterns. Include connection strings, SQL commands, SP calls, XML/INI mappers, EF models, repository methods, LINQ expressions. Output to analysis/output/03_dal_inventory.md ONLY.

commands.name: Extract Domain Model
commands.description: Analyze domain entities, services, relationships, DI graphs.
commands.prompt: Apply GENERIC_DOMAIN_INFERENCE_GUIDE.md. Infer domain entities from classes, namespaces, DTOs, EF models, Unity configuration, Core.Services, controllers, and DAL object graphs. Build a domain map. Output to analysis/output/04_domain_model.md. No inline output.

commands.name: Propose Microservices
commands.description: Generate bounded contexts and microservice candidates.
commands.prompt: Use GENERIC_MICROSERVICE_DECOMPOSITION_GUIDE.md to infer bounded contexts, entity ownership, transactional boundaries, workflow clusters, and API cohesion. Propose microservices. Output to analysis/output/05_microservice_candidates.md.

commands.name: Generate Migration Plan
commands.description: Produce a full .NET â†’ Spring Boot modernization plan.
commands.prompt: Use GENERIC_SPRINGBOOT_MIGRATION_BLUEPRINT.md and TEMPLATE_MIGRATION_PLAN.md to generate a vendor-neutral migration plan including phases, architecture strategy, data strategy, API rewrite plan, DAL migration, integration approach, and rollout stages. Output to analysis/output/06_migration_plan.md ONLY.

commands.name: Generate Required Spring Boot Services
commands.description: Selective code generation for only the services the app actually needs.
commands.prompt: Use CODE_GENERATION_PIPELINE.md. Based on extracted domain and microservice candidates, generate ONLY the Spring Boot modules required. Include: Maven multi-module structure, module POMs, application.java, configs, logging, exceptions, basic controller skeletons, and package layout. Output folder: SpringBootGenerated/. No inline output.

commands.name: Generate JPA Entities
commands.description: Selective generation of Spring Boot JPA entities.
commands.prompt: Based on DAL and domain discovery, generate ONLY required JPA entities. Use naming rules and conventions from CODE_GENERATION_PIPELINE.md and TEMPLATE_SPRINGBOOT_MODULE.md. Write results to SpringBootGenerated/entities.md and entity source files under SpringBootGenerated/<service>/src/main/java/. No inline output.

commands.name: Generate Repositories
commands.description: Create Spring Data JPA and MyBatis repositories.
commands.prompt: Use TEMPLATE_SPRINGBOOT_MODULE.md and GENERIC_DAL_MODERNIZATION_GUIDE.md. Generate JPA repositories for simple queries and MyBatis XML mappers/JdbcTemplate for complex SQL. Write output under SpringBootGenerated/<service>/src/main/java/... and SpringBootGenerated/<service>/src/main/resources/mappers/. No inline output.

commands.name: Generate Controllers
commands.description: Generate REST controllers for migrated microservices (Spring MVC).
commands.prompt: Transform .NET controllers, WCF contracts, ASMX WebMethods, Web API controllers using GENERIC_API_EXTRACTION_GUIDE.md and TEMPLATE_SPRINGBOOT_MODULE.md. Output to SpringBootGenerated/<service>/src/main/java/... No inline output.

commands.name: Generate WebFlux Integrations
commands.description: Generate non-blocking WebFlux clients for async/remote integrations.
commands.prompt: Using TEMPLATE_SPRINGBOOT_WEBFLUX_CLIENT.md and the hybrid design, generate WebClient-based async integration clients for external services, queues, or legacy endpoints. Output to SpringBootGenerated/<service>/src/main/java/... No inline output.

commands.name: Generate Maven Multi-Module Structure
commands.description: Generate parent POM + child modules for Option 2 multi-module build.
commands.prompt: Based on CODE_GENERATION_PIPELINE.md, generate a multi-module Maven build with parent pom.xml and child services. Output all files to SpringBootGenerated/. No inline output.
